data.author: TurtleDuck Studios

changelog.release_notes:
Added workaround for Yahoo GPS reverse geocoder.
Temporarily disabled Invert color function, will need to be re-implemented due to Pebble API changes.
Fix timeline regression
Attempted fix for the teleportation issue

Added Timeline pins for precipitation
Changed sunrise/sunset pins to be off by default

Tuned gesture sensitivity for Pebble Time
The bluetooth disconnection icon has a place for itself now
Updated APIs to use Pebble SDK 3
Fix potential font alignment issue on the Pebble Round
Added theoretical support for Pebble Round
New: Timeline pins
New options to control animations and layout
Fix boundary issue with LECO font
New Font Option
Workaround to fix issue on Pebble Time
Temporary workaround for Aplite dark theme issue.
Fixed display issue with forecasted temperatures

Recompiled with SDK 3.1
Minor text changes
Improved rain forecasting
Compiled with SDK 3.0-beta10
Fixed: Battery icon

Initial support for Pebble Time
Colorized icons

New: Option for Bluetooth vibration
New: Option for Roboto / Futura fonts
New: Option for Font sizes
New: Added backup logic for GPS fix

data.description:
It's a simple forecast watchface, with a bit of magic. Check out the website for a short video.

• Uses Yahoo, OpenWeatherMap, Forecast.io / DarkSky data
• Show forecast with a gentle wrist twist
• Lunar Phases (on clear nights)
• Sunrise, Sunset, and Precipitation* pins on Timeline
• Configurable alerts for bluetooth and battery
• Saves battery when your watch is at rest

If there's no rain during the week, the weekend forecast will be shown!

The forecast window has 3 columns:
Left - Today's forecast
Middle - Tomorrow's forecast
Right - If there's no rain on the day after tomorrow, it'll show the furthest available forecast

* Requires the "Smart Auto" weather provider to be set

latest_release.release_notes:
Added workaround for Yahoo GPS reverse geocoder.
Temporarily disabled Invert color function, will need to be re-implemented due to Pebble API changes.

data.title: Minimalist Weather
